definition: the ovaries, roe and digestive tract of the crab/soft interior of crab as a food delicacy/crab meat
crab roe/crab spawn/(used for crab meat in general)

sentences.english: Its color is Gold Halo, SilkWorm sheath, ovaries and fat, purple belt, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 其色彩有金暈，蠶紋，蟹黃，紫帶等等。

sentences.english: I do not know the reason until they season, did not taste the crab-rich roe crab paste.
sentences.chinese: 不知道是未到季節的緣故，沒嚐到海蟹的蟹黃蟹膏。

sentences.english: After eating crab roe, you can eat crab meat.
sentences.chinese: 喫完蟹黃就該喫蟹肉了。

sentences.english: The more luxurious versions often have crab meat and a topping of crab roe.
sentences.chinese: 昂貴的配料通常是蟹肉和蟹黃。

sentences.english: Yes. The next one is bean curd with crab roe.
sentences.chinese: 是的，下一個是蟹黃豆腐。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
